item.title: Informs Annual Meeting. Anaheim, CA | October 24-27, 2021
item.author: Author
item.description: I’m going to present the work I’m developing with my advisor, Professor Nicole Adler, from the title “Aiding airlines for the benefit of whom? An applied game-theoretic model” at the INFORMS Annual Meeting 2021. See you there!

item.title: Welcome
item.author: Author
item.description: Welcome to my website! Here I will post my activities. Get stick around!
